messages.content: What is the purpose of comfyui_facetools?
comfyui_facetools provide custom nodes for rotation aware face extraction, paste back, and various face related masking options in ComfyUI.
What are the different mask types available in the FaceDetails node?
The FaceDetails node in comfyui_facetools offers three mask types: simple_square, convex_hull, and BiSeNet.
What is the purpose of the OrderedFaceFilter node in comfyui_facetools?
The OrderedFaceFilter node in comfyui_facetools works similarly to the ImpactSEGSOrderedfilter.
Which model is required for the BiSeNet mask type in comfyui_facetools?
To use the BiSeNet mask type in comfyui_facetools, you need to download the BiSeNet model.
What is the purpose of the WarpFacesBack node in comfyui_facetools?
The WarpFacesBack node in comfyui_facetools is used to warp the cropped face images back into the original image using the provided warp matrices.
What are the required inputs for the AlignFaces node in comfyui_facetools?
The AlignFaces node in comfyui_facetools requires the following inputs: insightface, image, threshold, min_size, and max_size.
What is the purpose of the GenderFaceFilter node in comfyui_facetools?
The GenderFaceFilter node in comfyui_facetools is designed to filter faces based on gender, although it needs more work as the InsightFace gender classifier is not very accurate.
